verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> unto Aaron אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> You וּבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> Thou and thy sons וּבֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> and thy father's אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> with thee shall bear אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity הַמִּקְדָּ֑שׁ <WH4720> of the sanctuary וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> and you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> and thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> for תִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> with thee shall bear אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> the iniquity כְּהֻנַּתְכֶֽם׃ <WH3550> of your priesthood

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> also אֶת־ <WH853> אַחֶיךָ֩ <WH251> And thy brethren מַטֵּ֨ה <WH4294> also of the tribe לֵוִ֜י <WH3878> of Levi שֵׁ֤בֶט <WH7626> the tribe אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> of thy father הַקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> bring אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> for וְיִלָּו֥וּ <WH3867> thou with thee that they may be joined עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> with וִֽישָׁרְת֑וּךָ <WH8334> unto thee and minister וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> unto thee but thou and thy sons אִתָּ֔ךְ <WH854> for לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> with thee [shall minister] before אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle הָעֵדֻֽת׃ <WH5715> of witness

וְשָֽׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> And they shall keep מִֽשְׁמַרְתְּךָ֔ <WH4931> thy charge וּמִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> and the charge כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of all the tabernacle אַךְ֩ <WH389> also אֶל־ <WH413> to כְּלֵ֨י <WH3627> the vessels הַקֹּ֤דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> and the altar לֹ֣א <WH3808> or יִקְרָ֔בוּ <WH7126> only they shall not come nigh וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> or יָמֻ֥תוּ <WH4191> that neither they nor ye also die גַם־ <WH1571> both הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like גַּם־ <WH1571> both אַתֶּֽם׃ <WH859> you

וְנִלְו֣וּ <WH3867> And they shall be joined עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> with וְשָֽׁמְר֗וּ <WH8104> unto thee and keep אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH4931> the charge אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> for all עֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> for all the service הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle וְזָ֖ר <WH2114> and a stranger לֹא־ <WH3808> may not יִקְרַ֥ב <WH7126> shall not come nigh אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH413> about

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH8104> And ye shall keep אֵ֚ת <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> the charge הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֣רֶת <WH4931> and the charge הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> of the altar וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will no יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become ע֛וֹד <WH5750> longer קֶ֖צֶף <WH7110> that there be no wrath עַל־ <WH5921> on בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> any more upon the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> Myself הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold לָקַ֙חְתִּי֙ <WH3947> And I behold I have taken אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵיכֶ֣ם <WH251> your brethren הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites מִתּ֖וֹךְ <WH8432> from among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לָכֶ֞ם מַתָּנָ֤ה <WH4979> [as] a gift נְתֻנִים֙ <WH5414> to you [they are] given לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD לַעֲבֹ֕ד <WH5647> to do אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> the service אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> Therefore thou and thy sons אִ֠תְּךָ <WH854> for תִּשְׁמְר֨וּ <WH8104> with thee shall keep אֶת־ <WH853> כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֜ם <WH3550> your priest's office לְכָל־ <WH3605> everything דְּבַ֧ר <WH1697> for every thing הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <WH4196> of the altar וּלְמִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and within לַפָּרֹ֖כֶת <WH6532> the vail וַעֲבַדְתֶּ֑ם <WH5647> and ye shall serve עֲבֹדַ֣ת <WH5656> [unto you] as a service מַתָּנָ֗ה <WH4979> of gift אֶתֵּן֙ <WH5414> I have given אֶת־ <WH853> כְּהֻנַּתְכֶ֔ם <WH3550> your priest's office וְהַזָּ֥ר <WH2114> and the stranger הַקָּרֵ֖ב <WH7126> approach יוּמָֽת׃ <WH4191> shall be put to death ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹן֒ <WH175> unto Aaron וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> Myself הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> now behold נָתַ֣תִּֽי <WH5414> Behold I also have given לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <WH4931> thee the charge תְּרוּמֹתָ֑י <WH8641> of mine heave offerings לְכָל־ <WH3605> all קָדְשֵׁ֣י <WH6918> holy בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <WH3478> of Israel לְךָ֨ נְתַתִּ֧ים <WH5414> unto thee have I given לְמָשְׁחָ֛ה <WH4888> them by reason of the anointing וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <WH1121> and to thy sons לְחָק־ <WH2706> by an ordinance עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

זֶֽה־ <WH2088> This יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֛ מִקֹּ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> This shall be thine of the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy things מִן־ <WH4480> from הָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> [reserved] from the fire כָּל־ <WH3605> every קָ֠רְבָּנָם <WH7133> every oblation לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> every מִנְחָתָ֞ם <WH4503> of theirs every meat offering וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and every חַטָּאתָ֗ם <WH2403> of theirs and every sin offering וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and every אֲשָׁמָם֙ <WH817> of theirs and every trespass offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יָשִׁ֣יבוּ <WH7725> of theirs which they shall render לִ֔י קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> unto me [shall be] most קָֽדָשִׁ֥ים <WH6944> holy לְךָ֛ ה֖וּא <WH1931> he וּלְבָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1121> for thee and for thy sons

בְּקֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> In the most הַקֳּדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy תֹּאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> [place] shalt thou eat כָּל־ <WH3605> every זָכָר֙ <WH2145> it every male יֹאכַ֣ל <WH398> shall eat אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> קֹ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> it it shall be holy יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּֽךְ׃

וְזֶה־ <WH2088> This לְּךָ֞ תְּרוּמַ֣ת <WH8641> And this [is] thine the heave offering מַתָּנָ֗ם <WH4976> of their gift לְכָל־ <WH3605> all תְּנוּפֹת֮ <WH8573> with all the wave offerings בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <WH3478> of Israel לְךָ֣ נְתַתִּ֗ים <WH5414> I have given וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ <WH1121> them unto thee and to thy sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1323> and to thy daughters אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> for לְחָק־ <WH2706> with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone טָה֥וֹר <WH2889> every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> in thy house יֹאכַ֥ל <WH398> shall eat אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> All the best יִצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> of the oil וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> and all the best תִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> of the wine וְדָגָ֑ן <WH1715> and of the wheat רֵאשִׁיתָ֛ם <WH7225> the firstfruits אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִתְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> of them which they shall offer לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְךָ֥ נְתַתִּֽים׃ <WH5414> them have I given

בִּכּוּרֵ֞י <WH1061> [And] whatsoever is first ripe כָּל־ <WH3605> of all אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which בְּאַרְצָ֛ם <WH776> in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> which they shall bring לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD לְךָ֣ יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> shall be yours כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone טָה֥וֹר <WH2889> shall be thine every one that is clean בְּבֵיתְךָ֖ <WH1004> in thine house יֹאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH398> shall eat
כָּל־ <WH3605> Every חֵ֥רֶם <WH2764> Every thing devoted בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel לְךָ֥ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

כָּל־ <WH3605> Every פֶּ֣טֶר <WH6363> Every thing that openeth רֶ֠חֶם <WH7358> the matrix לְֽכָל־ <WH3605> of all בָּשָׂ֞ר <WH1320> in all flesh אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יַקְרִ֧יבוּ <WH7126> which they bring לַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בָּאָדָ֥ם <WH120> [whether it be] of men וּבַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> or beasts יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֑ךְ אַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH389> nevertheless פָּדֹ֣ה <WH6299> shalt thou surely תִפְדֶּ֗ה <WH6299> redeem אֵ֚ת <WH853> בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> shall be thine nevertheless the firstborn הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> בְּכֽוֹר־ <WH1060> and the firstling הַבְּהֵמָ֥ה <WH929> beasts הַטְּמֵאָ֖ה <WH2931> of unclean תִּפְדֶּֽה׃ <WH6299> shalt thou redeem

וּפְדוּיָו֙ <WH6299> And those that are to be redeemed מִבֶּן־ <WH1121> old חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> from a month תִּפְדֶּ֔ה <WH6299> shalt thou redeem בְּעֶ֨רְכְּךָ֔ <WH6187> according to thine estimation כֶּ֛סֶף <WH3701> for the money חֲמֵ֥שֶׁת <WH2568> of five שְׁקָלִ֖ים <WH8255> shekels בְּשֶׁ֣קֶל <WH8255> after the shekel הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <WH6944> of the sanctuary עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> which [is] twenty גֵּרָ֖ה <WH1626> gerahs הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> which

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> but בְּֽכוֹר־ <WH1060> But the firstling שׁ֡וֹר <WH7794> of a cow אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or בְכ֨וֹר <WH1060> or the firstling כֶּ֜שֶׂב <WH3775> of a sheep אֽוֹ־ <WH176> or בְכ֥וֹר <WH1060> or the firstling עֵ֛ז <WH5795> of a goat לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִפְדֶּ֖ה <WH6299> thou shalt not redeem קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> they [are] holy הֵ֑ם <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמָ֞ם <WH1818> their blood תִּזְרֹ֤ק <WH2236> thou shalt sprinkle עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> upon the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֶלְבָּ֣ם <WH2459> their fat תַּקְטִ֔יר <WH6999> and shalt burn אִשֶּׁ֛ה <WH801> [for] an offering made by fire לְרֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> for a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

וּבְשָׂרָ֖ם <WH1320> And the flesh יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֑ךְ כַּחֲזֵ֧ה <WH2373> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֛ה <WH8573> of them shall be thine as the wave וּכְשׁ֥וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַיָּמִ֖ין <WH3225> and as the right לְךָ֥ יִהְיֶֽה׃ <WH1961> become

כֹּ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> All תְּרוּמֹ֣ת <WH8641> All the heave offerings הַקֳּדָשִׁ֗ים <WH6944> of the holy things אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָרִ֥ימוּ <WH7311> offer בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> which the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel לַֽיהוָה֒ <WH3068> unto the LORD נָתַ֣תִּֽי <WH5414> have I given לְךָ֗ וּלְבָנֶ֧יךָ <WH1121> thee and thy sons וְלִבְנֹתֶ֛יךָ <WH1323> and thy daughters אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> for לְחָק־ <WH2706> with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever בְּרִית֩ <WH1285> it [is] a covenant מֶ֨לַח <WH4417> of salt עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> for ever הִוא֙ <WH1931> he לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD לְךָ֖ וּלְזַרְעֲךָ֥ <WH2233> unto thee and to thy seed אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> for

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> spake יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron בְּאַרְצָם֙ <WH776> in their land לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall have no תִנְחָ֔ל <WH5157> Thou shalt have no inheritance וְחֵ֕לֶק <WH2506> neither shalt thou have any part לֹא־ <WH3808> nor יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> own לְךָ֖ בְּתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am חֶלְקְךָ֙ <WH2506> them I [am] thy part וְנַחֲלָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH5159> and thine inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> among בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וְלִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children לֵוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold נָתַ֛תִּי <WH5414> And behold I have given כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַֽעֲשֵׂ֥ר <WH4643> all the tenth בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <WH5159> for an inheritance חֵ֤לֶף <WH2500> for עֲבֹֽדָתָם֙ <WH5656> their service אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֵ֣ם <WH1992> they עֹֽבְדִ֔ים <WH5647> which they serve אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַ֖ת <WH5656> [even] the service אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִקְרְב֥וּ <WH7126> come nigh ע֛וֹד <WH5750> henceforth בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> Neither must the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> about אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <WH4150> of the congregation לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> lest they bear חֵ֖טְא <WH2399> sin לָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> and die

וְעָבַ֨ד <WH5647> shall do הַלֵּוִ֜י <WH3881> But the Levites ה֗וּא <WH1931> he אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבֹדַת֙ <WH5656> the service אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְהֵ֖ם <WH1992> and they יִשְׂא֣וּ <WH5375> and they shall bear עֲוֹנָ֑ם <WH5771> their iniquity חֻקַּ֤ת <WH2708> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָם֙ <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1755> throughout your generations וּבְתוֹךְ֙ <WH8432> that among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֥א <WH3808> no יִנְחֲל֖וּ <WH5157> they have נַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> no inheritance
